entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who told Rookwood something, showing that he has some authority or power over Rookwood.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is a person who is being spoken to by Harry and seems to be in a state of fear or relief.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as someone whose gratitude Rookwood has earned.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: Avery is a person who is being summoned by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry grants Rookwood his gratitude, implying that Rookwood has done something to earn it.
Harry summons Avery, indicating a power dynamic where Harry is in control and can call others to him.
